scripts.local_build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../phonebook-frontend && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../phonebook
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../phonebook-frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../phonebook
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
